metadata.shot_summary: Luxury Car glides along the grand road, signaling elite arrival and impending life shift.

metadata.shot_summary: Servants’ faces turn toward the arrival, ‘muh banana’ forming a silent public verdict.

metadata.shot_summary: GAYATRI turns serious, warning him not to ‘chipak,’ dominance made explicit and performative.

audio.dialogue: Dekho zyada chipakne ki koshish mat karna... Abhi tak tumne mujhe nahi haraya hai... Wo to baki yoddha tumhe mil kar maar na den isliye maine tumhe select kar liya.... samjhe?
audio.audio_cue_intent: Score tightens, voice cuts sharp, ambience drops for impact.

metadata.shot_summary: ‘Now follow me’ lands as a final directive, pushing PYARELAAL into visible submission.

audio.dialogue: Haan sab teri wajah se hua hai.. Chuhiya...

metadata.shot_summary: SIA asserts ‘chuhiya nahi siya’ but PYARELAAL dismisses her, sealing the imbalance.

audio.dialogue:
Papa chuhiya nahi siya....
Haan haan chal....
audio.audio_cue_intent: Comedic edge fades, sting remains, score holds uneasy note.
